info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 9:20AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Hancock, southeastern Warren and McDonough Counties through 1000 AM CST... At 920 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Colchester, or near Macomb, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Western Illinois University around 925 AM CST. Macomb, Good Hope and Sciota around 930 AM CST. Bardolph around 935 AM CST. Bushnell around 940 AM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Prairie City and Little Swan Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
